name: Zoka Bubble Magic Line
description:
Zoka Bubble Magic Line is a very fun and addictive bubble shooting game, you won’t stop playing!


HOW TO PLAY
• Tap where you want to throw!
• Match 3 or more bubbles of the same color to pop!
• Special boosters & bubbles to help you pass those tricky levels.
• Pop all bubbles with minimum shoots to win higher scores
• Don't worry! No time limits!
